product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: K | RAW MATERIAL STORE > K3 | WATER CURTAIN
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  conforming to IS-1239 / IS-3589 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope. 50 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy (class-c), standard: indian standard 1239 / indian standard 3589, fittings: tees, elbows, reducers, union, flanges, rubber gaskets, gi(galvanized iron) nuts bolts, washer, structural steels for pipe supports, support: hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps, fixing: supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps, hangers (using anchor fastners), scope: cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope, painting: 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints, supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with wet pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. Size 80 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: trim assembly: wet pilot, fitted with: strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, pressure switch, solenoid valve: flame proof 2 way, air filter regulator: included, manual release unit: included

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: K | RAW MATERIAL STORE > K3 | WATER CURTAIN
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 150 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, standard: indian standard 1239 part-1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, etc., clamps: reduces clamps, support: ms(mild steel) support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, pipe joints: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope
